WHAT DRIVES US​

Our mission is to create a community and harness the power of the collective to achieve the sustainable future we all deserve.

No Bull

We want to arm people with the knowledge and pathway they need to join the fight. Real change can be clear and simple, we promise.

Community

More is more when it comes to getting people involved to reach our climate targets. No more exclusivity, just people coming together to make change.

Fun

Climate change is a serious issue that needs serious solutions. However, we believe happy minds are productive minds. Plus, adding a bit of fun always gets more people on board.

NO BULL

We want to arm people with the knowledge and pathway they need to join the fight. Real change can be clear and simple, we promise.

COMMUNITY

More is more when it comes to getting people involved to reach our climate targets. No more exclusivity, just people coming together to make change.

FUN

Climate change is a serious issue that needs serious solutions. However, we believe happy minds are productive minds. Plus, adding a bit of fun always gets more people on board.

WE’RE A COMPANY WITH DEEP ROOTS IN AGRICULTURE.

CleverCow was an idea born from the leaders at DIT AgTech. DIT AgTech has created the methane reduction technology needed to significantly reduce methane emissions across the agriculture industry. It is this tech, we are producing and providing to farmers as part of the CleverCow project. ​

LEARN MORE

CleverCow was an idea born from the leaders at DIT AgTech. DIT AgTech has created the methane reduction technology needed to significantly reduce methane emissions across the agriculture industry. It is this tech, we are producing and providing to farmers as part of the CleverCow project. ​

LEARN MORE

ACTIONS SPEAK LOUDER THAN WORDS.

We are serious about change. That is why, as part of the CleverCow project we are providing our methane-reducing solutions to livestock farmers, free of charge, to help drive rapid adoption.​
